entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -19.7°C
Wind: E 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Blowing snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
